source.sqlReaderQuery: select HW_Date from dbo.HWMTable where Tablename='Customer'
select max(ModifiedDate) as LastRecordDate from saleslt.customer

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.Customer where ModifiedDate>'@{activity('Get Table Date HWM').output.firstRow.HW_Date}' and ModifiedDate<='@{activity('Fetch Date from Table').output.firstRow.LastRecordDate}'
